frontMatter.description: A Vault must be unsealed before it can access its data. Likewise, it can be sealed to lock it down.

but is encrypted by yet another mechanism: the unseal key.`),mdx("p",e({},{className:"g-type-long-body"}),`To recap: most Vault data is encrypted using the encryption key in the keyring;

update the `,mdx("a",e({parentName:"p"},{href:"/docs/configuration/seal"}),"seal configuration")," and add ",mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},'disabled = "true"'),` to the seal block. This allows the migration to use this information to

block. Then add another seal block to describe the new seal.`),mdx("p",e({},{className:"g-type-long-body"}),"When you bring your server back up, run the unseal process with the ",mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},"-migrate"),`
flag and use the Recovery Keys to perform the migration. All unseal commands
must specify the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},"-migrate"),` flag. Once the required threshold of recovery keys
are entered, the recovery keys will be kept and used as recovery keys in the new
seal.`),mdx("h4",e({},{className:"g-type-display-5"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h4"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#migration-with-integrated-storage","aria-label":"migration with integrated storage permalink"}),"\xBB"),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h4"},{className:"__target-h",id:"migration-with-integrated-storage","aria-hidden":""})),"Migration with Integrated Storage"),mdx("p",e({},{className:"g-type-long-body"}),`Integrated Storage uses the Raft protocol underneath, which requires a quorum of
servers to be online before the cluster is functional. Therefore, bringing the
cluster back up one node at a time with the seal configuration updated, will not
work in this case. Follow the same steps for each kind of migration described
above with the exception that after the cluster is taken offline, update the
seal configurations of all the nodes appropriately and bring them all back up.
When the quorum of nodes are back up, Raft will elect a leader and the leader
node that will perform the migration. The migrated information will be replicated to
all other cluster peers and when the peers eventually become the leader,
migration will not happen again on the peer nodes.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

routes.title: HA Enterprise DR Clusters with Raft
HA Enterprise Performance Clusters with Raft
